clues.answer: Baa, baa, black sheep (Black sheep, black sheep)

finalJeopardy.clue: Macbeth has a vision of a line of 8 Scottish kings, the 8th holding a mirror to reflect this 9th in line who may have been in the audience
finalJeopardy.answer: James I of England (James VI of Scotland)
